item.title: Help me with starter it dont work!
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

if it doesnt work then search for

if (command.startsWith("pnpc")

then right above it add

 if (command.startsWith("starter") && playerRights >= -0)
			{
				addItem(ITEM ID, ITEM AMOUNT);
				addItem(ITEM ID, ITEM AMOUNT);
				addItem(ITEM ID, ITEM AMOUNT);
				addItem(ITEM ID, ITEM AMOUNT);
			}

or

if (command.startsWith("starter") { addItem(ITEM ID, ITEM AMOUNT); addItem(ITEM ID, ITEM AMOUNT); addItem(ITEM ID, ITEM AMOUNT); addItem(ITEM ID, ITEM AMOUNT); }
i prefere useing the stop 1
